name: Heath Ledger
description:
Hey you, the jerks at Jew or Not Jew!

How dare you mark Heath Ledger as "Not a Jew"? His maternal great-great-grandmother was Jewish, which makes him a Jew! Who are you to go against Halacha? Read the Talmud, you idiots!

Piss off,

A real Jew


Hey you, the jerks at Jew or Not Jew!

How dare you mark Heath Ledger as "Jew"? He never practiced Judaism! In fact, he was an atheist! Who are you to go against the person's true beliefs? Read Heath's biography, you idiots!

Get bent,

A real Jew



We can't win.
